name: SpiceTranslate
0:
”Alexa ask spice translate to translate basil to spanish”
”Alexa launch spice translate and get translation for bay leaves in italian”
”Alexa ask spice translate what is basil in german”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spice translate
des: An use-full Alexa Skill which uses Google Translate to translate list of spices in World to different language such as Spanish,Italian,German,Polish,French,English.More language support will be updated soon.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
